description: This welcoming restaurant with an open-view kitchen serves cuisine influenced by the traditions of Mantova and the Veneto, alongside more creative dishes inspired by the chef’s imagination. The chef’s wife provides a friendly welcome front of house, plus there’s a delightful garden for alfresco dining in fine weather.
